docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This lib is used to manage socket for Orix

docs.title: inet_aton
docs.text:
Description

Convert ip str to int 32, returns 255 255 255 255 if error

Input

  • Accumulator : Low addr of string
  • X Register : high addr

Modify

  • RESB
  • RES
  • TR0
  • TR3

Returns

docs.title: inet_aton(const char cp, unsigned long inp);
inet_addr
docs.text:
Description

Convert ip str to int 32, returns 255 255 255 255 if error

Input

  • Accumulator : Low addr of string
  • X Register : high addr

Returns

  • Accumulator : First byte

  • X Register : Second byte

  • Y Register : Third byte
